post.description: create a user bank account on database.

401.description: Returns an error for: user invalid credentials or token not provided/invalid.

409.description: Returns an error for: user bank account already exists.

get.description: searches for a user bank account on database.

401.description: Returns an error for: user invalid credentials or token not provided/invalid.

404.description: Returns an error for: user bank account not found.

patch.description: increments user bank account balance on database.

200.description: Returns success for user bank account balance increment.

401.description: Returns an error for: user invalid credentials or token not provided/invalid.

404.description: Returns an error for: user bank account not found.
